AboutMe

Let me tell you a few things...

Brandon Collins

I first became interested in web development in 2016. During the time I worked on building an ecommerce store using the Shopify platform. After closing the Shopify store I began teaching myself to code using various textbooks and online resources. Currently I attend college classes in iOS, ASP.NET, CSS, and JavaScript. When not in school I spend my time volunteering, bartending, and leaning online. Currently I'm working on building skills with React & Redux.
